targets.expr: up{job="federate", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} == 0 or up{job="aptos-procs", role="validator", chain_name=~"$chain_name"} == 0

panels.description: Average participation uptime for 30 days. A node is required to propose at least one block every 12 hours to be counted as up.
panels.title: Validator Participation SLA

panels.description: Average fullnode uptime for 30 days. A fully synchronized fullnode is counted as up.
panels.title: Fullnode Uptime SLA

panels.description: Number of upstream validator peers a full node can proxy transactions up to
panels.title: Fullnode Upstream Peers

panels.description: The error rate of main loop.
panels.title: Error Rate
